name: SUPER FOX
description: THE TAIL OF SUPER FOX. THIS IS AN INCREDIBLE ADVENTURE OF A YOUNG COURAGEOUS FOX NAMED MEW FOXOV, ALSO KNOWS AS - SUPER FOX. HE TRAVELS TO FOUR FAR-AWAY KINGDOMS, FIGHTING MONSTERS AND COLLECTING BONUSES TO RETRIEVE FOUR STOLEN RELICS - THE ELEMENT STONES. BUT SOON, THE SUPERHERO LEARNS, THAT SOMETIMES, THINGS ARE A BIT MORE MYSTERIOUS AND COMPLEX THAN THEY SEEM.
